requirements.summary: Remove the 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link and text from the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer component no longer displays 'Built with caffeine.ai' text
The caffeine.ai link is removed from the footer
Footer layout adjusts appropriately without the attribution

file_operations.description: Remove the 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link and text while preserving the copyright information. Update the footer layout to display only the copyright section without the attribution.
